statements: DELETE FROM QualityControlData WHERE product_id = 1001 AND passed_inspection = FALSE;
DELETE FROM QualityControlData WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Inc.' AND production_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM QualityChecks WHERE check_id = 10 OR inspector_name = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM QualityChecks WHERE check_passed = 0 AND product_id = 2;
DELETE FROM quality_checks WHERE inspector_id = 5 AND check_result = 'Failed';
DELETE FROM products WHERE product_id = 100 AND expiry_date < '2022-12-31';
